n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)))),'') as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], ISNULL((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.Estado='activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Nota_Final_Tercero_A_Sexto_Cuantitativo] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Nota_Final_Tercero_A_Sexto_Cuantitativo] @Grado nchar(20), @Anio int as
begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan,a.IdAlumno,(select distinct(n.IdDocente) from Notas n inner join Alumnos al on n.IdAlumno=al.IdAlumno where al.IdMined=a.IdMined and n.Anio=@Anio and n.Estado='Activo') as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('Final')as Evaluacion, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as [Matemática], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [LENGUA EXTRANGERA], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EE FF], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EAEP], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES ') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CIENCIAS NATURALES], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CIENCIAS SOCIALES], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as TAC, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.Estado='activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Notas_Insertar_Final] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Notas_Insertar_Final] @IdCorte int, @IdAsignatura int, @IdAlumno int, @IdDocente int, @Nivel nchar(20), @Anio int as begin declare @corte nvarchar(20),@id_Corte int,@Nota int select @corte=nombre from Corte where IdCorte=@IdCorte
select @id_Corte=dbo.ID_CORTE('FINAL') select @Nota=ISNULL(avg(Nota),0) from Notas where IdCorte between dbo.ID_CORTE('I Corte') and dbo.ID_CORTE('IV Corte') and IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and Anio=@Anio and IdAsignatura=@IdAsignatura
if not exists (select n.idalumno from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and n.Nivel=@Nivel and n.Anio=@Anio and n.IdCorte=@id_Corte and estado='Activo') begin insert into Notas(IdCorte,IdAsignatura,IdAlumno,IdDocente,Nivel,Anio,Fecha,Nota) values(@id_Corte,@IdAsignatura,@IdAlumno,@IdDocente,@Nivel,@Anio,getdate(),@Nota) end else begin update notas set nota=@Nota where IdCorte=@id_Corte and Anio=@Anio and IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdAsignatura=@IdAsignatura end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Notas_Insertar_Semestre] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Notas_Insertar_Semestre] @IdCorte int, @IdAsignatura int, @IdAlumno int, @IdDocente int, @Nivel nchar(20), @Anio int as begin declare @corte nvarchar(20),@id_Corte int,@Nota int,@Id_Nota int select @corte=rtrim(nombre) from Corte where IdCorte=@IdCorte if (@corte='II Corte') begin select @id_Corte=dbo.ID_CORTE('I Semestre') select @Nota=ISNULL(avg(Nota),0) from Notas where IdCorte between dbo.ID_CORTE('I Corte') and dbo.ID_CORTE('II Corte') and anio=@anio and idalumno=@idAlumno and idasignatura=@idasignatura end else if (@corte='IV Corte') begin select @id_Corte=dbo.ID_CORTE('II Semestre') select @Nota=ISNULL(avg(Nota),0) from Notas where IdCorte between dbo.ID_CORTE('III Corte') and dbo.ID_CORTE('IV Corte') and anio=@anio and idalumno=@idAlumno and idasignatura=@idasignatura end select @Id_Nota=n.idnota from notas N where n.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and n.Nivel=@Nivel and n.Anio=@Anio and n.IdCorte=@id_Corte and estado='Activo' if (@Id_Nota is null) begin insert into Notas(IdCorte,IdAsignatura,IdAlumno,IdDocente,Nivel,Anio,Fecha,Nota) values(@id_Corte,@IdAsignatura,@IdAlumno,@IdDocente,@Nivel,@Anio,getdate(),@Nota) end else begin update notas set nota=@Nota ,idcorte=@id_Corte,idasignatura=@idasignatura,idalumno=@idalumno, anio=@Anio where idnota=@Id_Nota end end
--select * from notas GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO Create Proc [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Eliminar] @Id_Nota int as begin delete Notas_Preescolar where Id_Nota=@Id_Nota end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO Create Proc [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Insertar] @Id_Alumno int, @Id_Docente int, @Id_Corte int, @Nivel nchar(10), @Anio int, @Nota nchar(5) as begin if not exists (select nota from Notas_Preescolar where Id_Alumno=@Id_Alumno and Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and Nivel=@Nivel and Anio=@Anio) begin insert into Notas_Preescolar(Id_Alumno,Id_Docente,Id_Corte,Nivel,Anio,Nota) values(@Id_Alumno,@Id_Docente,@Id_Corte,@Nivel,@Anio,@Nota) end else begin raiserror('La nota ya existe',16,1) end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Mostrar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create Proc [dbo].[Notas_Preescolar_Mostrar] -- LLamar al Proceso cuando se ingresen las notas @Id_Alumno int, @Id_corte int as begin select (a.Nombres+' '+a.Apellidos) as Estudiante,n.Nivel,c.Nombre as Corte,n.Nota as [Nivel de Aprendizaje],n.Anio from Notas_Preescolar N inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=n.Id_Alumno inner join Corte C on n.Id_Corte=c.IdCorte where n.Id_Alumno=@Id_Alumno and n.Id_Corte=@Id_corte end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Obtener_Id_Docente] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Obtener_Id_Docente] @Nombres nvarchar(60), @Apellidos nvarchar(60) as begin select idDocente from docentes D where d.nombres=@Nombres and d.Apellidos=@Apellidos end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Ra_Primaria] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE proc [dbo].[Ra_Primaria] -- RENDIMIENTO ACADEMICO PRIMARIA @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Turno nvarchar(30), @Anio int as begin --declare @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40),@Anio int --set @Id_Corte=1 --set @Modalidad='Primaria Regular' --set @Anio=2022 select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, (select E.Barrio from escuela E) as Barrio,
(select distinct(d.nombres+' '+d.apellidos) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director, (select distinct(d.Telefono) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director_Movil, dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)as Grado_N,m.Grado,m.modalidad,C.Nombre as Corte,m.Turno,
-- ******* Matricula Inicial AS and F ********** --
(select Mi.[as] from m_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_AS, (select Mi.F from M_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_F,
--(select count(idMatricula) from matricula ma where ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad)as MI_AS, --(select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula Ma on a.IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno where a.sexo='F' and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad)as MI_F,
-- ******* Matricula Actual AS and F ********** --
(select count(idMatricula) from matricula ma where exists(select IdAlumno from notas where IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno)and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad )as MA_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula Ma on a.IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno where exists(select IdAlumno from notas where IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno) and a.sexo='F' and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad )as MA_F,
-- ******** Aprobados Limios ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 1 a 2 ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 3 a mas ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
-- ******** Apobados por asignatura ********** --
ISNULL(sum(R.MATEMATICA),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.MATEMATICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.TAC),0)AS Apr_L_TAC_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.TAC) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_TAC_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]),0) AS Apr_L_CV_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CV_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[EE FF]),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[EE FF]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.EAEP),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.EAEP) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO]),0) AS Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]),0) AS Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por AS y F de 1º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_1_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_1_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AP_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AP_1_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por AS y F de 2º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_2_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_2_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AP_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AP_2_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 3º a 6º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>=90 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>=90 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AF_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AF_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 0 AND 59.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AI_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 0 AND 59.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AI_3_A_6_F
from Rendimiento R inner join Matricula M on M.IdAlumno=r.Id_Alumno and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=r.Anio inner join Corte C on c.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte inner join Alumnos A on A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno and A.IdAlumno=R.Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo'
where R.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and M.Modalidad=@Modalidad and R.Anio=@Anio and m.Turno=@Turno group by M.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio,c.Nombre,m.Estado,r.Anio,r.Id_Corte,m.Turno order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(M.Grado) END
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Ra_Primaria_2] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
Create proc [dbo].[Ra_Primaria_2] -- RENDIMIENTO ACADEMICO PRIMARIA @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Turno nvarchar(30), @Anio int as begin --declare @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40),@Anio int --set @Id_Corte=1 --set @Modalidad='Primaria Regular' --set @Anio=2022 select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, (select E.Barrio from escuela E) as Barrio,
(select distinct(d.nombres+' '+d.apellidos) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director, (select distinct(d.Telefono) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director_Movil, dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)as Grado_N,m.Grado,m.modalidad,C.Nombre as Corte,m.Turno,
-- ******* Matricula Inicial AS and F ********** --
(select sum(Mi.[as]) from m_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_AS, (select sum(Mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_F,
-- ******* Matricula Actual AS and F ********** --
(select count(idMatricula) from matricula ma where ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@Turno and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=ma.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))as MA_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula Ma on a.IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno where a.sexo='F' and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.Turno=@Turno and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=ma.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))as MA_F,
-- ******** Aprobados Limios ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 1 a 2 ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 3 a mas ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
-- ******** Apobados por asignatura ********** --
ISNULL(sum(R.MATEMATICA),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.MATEMATICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.TAC),0)AS Apr_L_TAC_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.TAC) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_TAC_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]),0) AS Apr_L_CV_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CV_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[EE FF]),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[EE FF]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.EAEP),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.EAEP) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO]),0) AS Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]),0) AS Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por AS y F de 1º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_1_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_1_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AP_1_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Primero' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AP_1_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por AS y F de 2º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_2_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_2_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AP_2_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 76 AND Ma.Grado='Segundo' AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AP_2_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 3º a 6º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>=90 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>=90 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AF_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AF_3_A_6_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 0 AND 59.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AI_3_A_6_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 0 AND 59.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 3 AND 6 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AI_3_A_6_F
from Rendimiento R inner join Matricula M on M.IdAlumno=r.Id_Alumno and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=r.Anio inner join Corte C on c.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte inner join Alumnos A on A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno and A.IdAlumno=R.Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo'
where R.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and M.Modalidad=@Modalidad and R.Anio=@Anio AND M.Turno=@Turno and m.estado='Activo' group by M.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio,c.Nombre,m.Estado,r.Anio,r.Id_Corte,M.Turno order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(M.Grado)
--from Rendimiento R inner join Matricula M on M.IdAlumno=r.Id_Alumno and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=r.Anio --inner join Corte C on c.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte inner join Alumnos A on A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno and A.IdAlumno=R.Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo'
--where R.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and M.Modalidad=@Modalidad and R.Anio=@Anio and m.Turno=@Turno --group by M.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio,c.Nombre,m.Estado,r.Anio,r.Id_Corte,m.Turno --order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(M.Grado) END
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Ra_Secundaria] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO --Ra_Secundaria 1,'Secundaria regular','Vespertino',2022 CREATE proc [dbo].[Ra_Secundaria] -- RENDIMIENTO ACADEMICO SECUNDARIA @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40), @Turno nvarchar(30), @Anio int as begin --declare @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40),@Anio int, @Turno nvarchar(30) --set @Id_Corte=1 --set @Modalidad='Secundaria regular' --set @Anio=2022 --set @Turno='Vespertino' select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, (select E.Barrio from escuela E) as Barrio, (select distinct(d.nombres+' '+d.apellidos) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director, (select distinct(d.Telefono) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director_Movil, dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)as Grado_N,m.Grado,m.modalidad,C.Nombre as Corte,M.Turno,
-- ******* Matricula Inicial AS and F ********** --
(select sum(Mi.[as]) from m_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_AS, (select sum(Mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_F,
-- ******* Matricula Actual AS and F ********** --
(select count(idMatricula) from matricula ma where ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@Turno and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=ma.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))as MA_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula Ma on a.IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno where a.sexo='F' and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.Turno=@Turno and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=ma.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))as MA_F,
-- ******** Aprobados Limios ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 1 a 2 ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 3 a mas ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
-- ******** Apobados por asignatura ********** --
ISNULL(sum(R.MATEMATICA),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.MATEMATICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EspAniol_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Ingles_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.TAC),0)AS Apr_L_TAC_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.TAC) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_TAC_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]),0) AS Apr_L_CV_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CV_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[EE FF]),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[EE FF]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EEFF_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.EAEP),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.EAEP) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_EAEP_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCNN_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_CCSS_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.QUIMICA),0) AS Apr_L_QUIMICA_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.QUIMICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_QUIMICA_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.FISICA),0) AS Apr_L_Fisica_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.FISICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Fisica_F,
ISNULL(sum(R.BIOLOGIA),0) AS Apr_L_BIOLOGIA_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.BIOLOGIA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_BIOLOGIA_F,

(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AF_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AF_11_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 60 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AI_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 60 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AI_11_F,
-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 7º A 11º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_7_A_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_7_A_11_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AS_7_A_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 76 AND 89.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AS_7_A_11_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AF_7_A_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia BETWEEN 60 AND 75.99 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AF_7_A_11_F,
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia <60 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AI_7_A_11_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia < 60 AND dbo.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado) BETWEEN 7 AND 11 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AI_7_A_11_F,
-- Retención 7
(convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=7 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[as]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100) as Rt_7_As,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=7 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100as Rt_7_F,
---- Retención 8
(convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[As]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100) as Rt_8_As,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_8_F,
---- Retención 9
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=9 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[As]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_9_As,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=9 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_9_F,
-- Retención 10
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=10 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[As]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_10_AS,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=10 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_10_F,
-- Retención 11
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=11 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[As]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_11_As,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=11 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_11_F
from Rendimiento R inner join Matricula M on M.IdAlumno=r.Id_Alumno and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=r.Anio inner join Corte C on c.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte inner join Alumnos A on A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno and A.IdAlumno=R.Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo'
where R.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and M.Modalidad=@Modalidad and R.Anio=@Anio AND M.Turno=@Turno and m.estado='Activo' group by M.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio,c.Nombre,m.Estado,r.Anio,r.Id_Corte,M.Turno order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(M.Grado) END
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Ra_Secundaria_2] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO --Ra_Secundaria 1,'Secundaria regular','Vespertino',2022 CREATE proc [dbo].[Ra_Secundaria_2] -- RENDIMIENTO ACADEMICO SECUNDARIA @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40), @Turno nvarchar(30), @Anio int as begin --declare @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(40),@Anio int, @Turno nvarchar(30) --set @Id_Corte=1 --set @Modalidad='Secundaria regular' --set @Anio=2022 --set @Turno='Vespertino' select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, (select E.Barrio from escuela E) as Barrio, (select distinct(d.nombres+' '+d.apellidos) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director, (select distinct(d.Telefono) as Director from Docentes D where D.Acceso='Director' ) as Director_Movil, dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)as Grado_N,m.Grado,m.modalidad,C.Nombre as Corte,M.Turno,
-- ******* Matricula Inicial AS and F ********** --
(select sum(Mi.[as]) from m_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_AS, (select sum(Mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.anio=m.Anio and mi.Modalidad=M.modalidad and mi.Turno=M.Turno) as MI_F,
-- ******* Matricula Actual AS and F ********** --
(select count(idMatricula) from matricula ma where ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@Turno and ma.Estado='Activo' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where nts.IdAlumno=ma.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado and nts.Estado='Activo'))as MA_AS,
(select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula Ma on a.IdAlumno=ma.IdAlumno where a.sexo='F' and ma.grado=M.Grado and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.Turno=@Turno and ma.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where nts.IdAlumno=a.idAlumno and nts.IdCorte=r.id_Corte and nts.Anio=ma.Anio and nts.Nivel=Ma.Grado and nts.Estado='Activo'))as MA_F,
-- ******** Aprobados Limios ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=M.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas=0) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 1 a 2 ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas between 1 and 2) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
-- ******** Aplasados de 3 a mas ********** --
(select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner Join Matricula Ma on Ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and re.Anio=ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and ma.Grado=M.grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS, (select count(Re.Asign_Aplasadas) from Rendimiento Re inner join Alumnos Al on re.Id_Alumno=al.IdAlumno inner join Matricula Ma on ma.IdAlumno=re.Id_Alumno and ma.Anio=m.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' where Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Al.Sexo='F' and ma.Grado=M.Grado and ma.turno=@turno and re.Asign_Aplasadas >2) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
-- ******** Apobados por asignatura ********** --
ISNULL(sum(R.MATEMATICA),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_AS, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(Re.MATEMATICA) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno AND Al.Sexo='F'),0) AS Apr_L_Matematica_F,

-- ********* Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por AS y F de 7º ********* --
(SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Ma.IdAlumno=Re.Id_Alumno AND Ma.Anio=Re.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' WHERE Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=7 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte)AS AA_7_AS, (SELECT COUNT(Re.Id_Alumno) FROM Rendimiento Re INNER JOIN Matricula Ma ON Re.Id_Alumno=Ma.IdAlumno AND RE.Anio=Ma.Anio and ma.Estado='Activo' INNER JOIN Alumnos Al ON AL.IdAlumno=Ma.IdAlumno WHERE Re.Anio=R.Anio AND Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte AND Ma.Grado=M.Grado AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad AND Al.Sexo='F' AND Re.Nivel_de_Competencia>89.99 AND DBO.Grado_Numerico(Ma.Grado)=7 AND Ma.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and ma.turno=@turno and Ma.Grado=M.Grado and Re.Anio=R.Anio and Re.Id_Corte=R.Id_Corte) AS AA_7_F,

-- Retención 7
(convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=7 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and c.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2),(select sum(mi.[as]) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100) as Rt_7_As,
convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=7 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100as Rt_7_F,

convert(decimal(5,2),convert(decimal(5,2), ((select COUNT(distinct t.Id_Alumno) from registro_de_notas t inner join Matricula C on C.IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and C.Anio=t.Anio inner join Alumnos Al on Al.IdAlumno=C.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=11 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=dbo.Grado_Numerico(c.Grado) AND C.Modalidad=M.Modalidad and C.turno=@turno and C.Anio=@Anio and t.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and al.Sexo='F' and exists (select nts.IdAlumno from Notas nts where IdAlumno=t.id_Alumno and nts.IdCorte=t.id_Corte and nts.Anio=t.Anio and nts.Nivel=M.Grado))))/ NullIf(convert(decimal(5,2), (select sum(mi.F) from M_Inicial Mi where mi.anio=M.Anio and Mi.Grado=M.Grado and Mi.modalidad=m.Modalidad and Mi.Turno=M.Turno)),0))*100 as Rt_11_F
from Rendimiento R inner join Matricula M on M.IdAlumno=r.Id_Alumno and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=r.Anio inner join Corte C on c.IdCorte=r.Id_Corte inner join Alumnos A on A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno and A.IdAlumno=R.Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo'
where R.Id_Corte=@Id_Corte and M.Modalidad=@Modalidad and R.Anio=@Anio AND M.Turno=@Turno and m.estado='Activo' group by M.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio,c.Nombre,m.Estado,r.Anio,r.Id_Corte,M.Turno order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(M.Grado) END --use Ctrl_Estudiantil --select count(m.IdAlumno) from matricula M inner join Alumnos A on a.idalumno=m.IdAlumno and a.estado='Activo' where Grado='Undécimo' and m.Turno='Matutino' --and a.Sexo='F'
--select *--distinct(n.id_Alumno), (a.nombres +' '+ a.apellidos) as Alumno, m.Grado,n.id_Corte --from Alumnos A inner join Registro_de_Notas n on a.IdAlumno=n.id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo' inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno --where M.Grado='Décimo' and n.id_Corte=5 and m.Turno='Matutino' --and a.Sexo='F'
--order by n.id_Alumno asc
--select distinct(a.IdAlumno), (a.nombres +' '+ a.apellidos) as Alumno, m.Grado --from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno --where m.Grado='Décimo' and m.Turno='Matutino' and a.Sexo='F'
--order by IdAlumno asc GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Registtro_de_Notas_Add_Asignatura] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE null',@Asignatura) exec @Query end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Rendimiento_Academico_Primaria_Insertar_Lote] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET
