,Apr_L_CV_AS,Apr_L_CV_F,Apr_L_EEFF_AS,Apr_L_EEFF_F,Apr_L_EAEP_AS,Apr_L_EAEP_F,Apr_L_CCNN_AS,Apr_L_CCNN_F,Apr_L_CCSS_AS ,Apr_L_CCSS_F,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F ,AA_1_AS,AA_1_F,AS_1_AS,AS_1_F,AF_1_AS,AF_1_F,AI_1_AS,AI_1_F,AA_2_AS,AA_2_F,AS_2_AS,AS_2_F,AF_2_AS,AF_2_F,AI_2_AS,AI_2_F,AA_3_A_6_AS ,AA_3_A_6_F,AS_3_A_6_AS,AS_3_A_6_F,AF_3_A_6_AS,AF_3_A_6_F,AI_3_A_6_AS,AI_3_A_6_F)
values( @IdCorte,@Año,@Grado,@Nivel,@modalidad,@Corte,@MI_AS,@MI_F,@MA_AS ,@MA_F ,@Aprovados_Limpios_AS ,@Aprovados_Limpios_F ,@Aplasados_AS ,@Aplasados_F ,@Aplasados_1a2_AS ,@Aplasados_1a2_F ,@Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS ,@Aplasados_3_a_mas_F ,@Apr_L_Matematica_AS ,@Apr_L_Matematica_F ,@Apr_L_Español_AS ,@Apr_L_Español_F ,@Apr_L_Ingles_AS ,@Apr_L_Ingles_F ,@Apr_L_TAC_AS ,@Apr_L_TAC_F ,@Apr_L_CV_AS ,@Apr_L_CV_F ,@Apr_L_EEFF_AS ,@Apr_L_EEFF_F ,@Apr_L_EAEP_AS ,@Apr_L_EAEP_F ,@Apr_L_CCNN_AS ,@Apr_L_CCNN_F ,@Apr_L_CCSS_AS ,@Apr_L_CCSS_F ,@Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS ,@Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F ,@Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS ,@Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F ,@AA_1_AS,@AA_1_F ,@AS_1_AS ,@AS_1_F ,@AF_1_AS ,@AF_1_F ,@AI_1_AS ,@AI_1_F ,@AA_2_AS ,@AA_2_F ,@AS_2_AS ,@AS_2_F ,@AF_2_AS ,@AF_2_F ,@AI_2_AS ,@AI_2_F ,@AA_3_A_6_AS ,@AA_3_A_6_F ,@AS_3_A_6_AS ,@AS_3_A_6_F ,@AF_3_A_6_AS ,@AF_3_A_6_F ,@AI_3_A_6_AS ,@AI_3_A_6_F
)
end else begin UPDATE Rendimiento_Academico_Primaria SET ID_Corte=@IdCorte,Año=@Año,Grado=@Grado,Nivel=@Nivel,modalidad=@modalidad ,Corte=@Corte,MI_AS=@MI_AS,MI_F=@MI_F,MA_AS=@MA_AS,MA_F=@MA_F,Aprovados_Limpios_AS=@Aprovados_Limpios_AS ,Aprovados_Limpios_F=@Aprovados_Limpios_F,Aplasados_AS=@Aplasados_AS,Aplasados_F=@Aplasados_F,Aplasados_1a2_AS=@Aplasados_1a2_AS ,Aplasados_1a2_F=@Aplasados_1a2_F,Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS=@Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,Aplasados_3_a_mas_F=@Aplasados_3_a_mas_F ,Apr_L_Matematica_AS=@Apr_L_Matematica_AS,Apr_L_Matematica_F=@Apr_L_Matematica_F,Apr_L_Español_AS=@Apr_L_Español_AS ,Apr_L_Español_F=@Apr_L_Español_F,Apr_L_Ingles_AS=@Apr_L_Ingles_AS,Apr_L_Ingles_F=@Apr_L_Ingles_F,Apr_L_TAC_AS=@Apr_L_TAC_AS ,Apr_L_TAC_F=@Apr_L_TAC_F,Apr_L_CV_AS=@Apr_L_CV_AS,Apr_L_CV_F=@Apr_L_CV_F,Apr_L_EEFF_AS=@Apr_L_EEFF_AS,Apr_L_EEFF_F=@Apr_L_EEFF_F ,Apr_L_EAEP_AS=@Apr_L_EAEP_AS,Apr_L_EAEP_F=@Apr_L_EAEP_F,Apr_L_CCNN_AS=@Apr_L_CCNN_AS,Apr_L_CCNN_F=@Apr_L_CCNN_F,Apr_L_CCSS_AS=@Apr_L_CCSS_AS ,Apr_L_CCSS_F=@Apr_L_CCSS_F,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS=@Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F=@Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F ,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS=@Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F=@Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F ,AA_1_AS=@AA_1_AS,AA_1_F=@AA_1_F,AS_1_AS=@AS_1_AS,AS_1_F=@AS_1_F,AF_1_AS=@AF_1_AS,AF_1_F=@AF_1_F,AI_1_AS=@AI_1_AS ,AI_1_F=@AI_1_F,AA_2_AS=@AA_2_AS,AA_2_F=@AA_2_F,AS_2_AS=@AS_2_AS,AS_2_F=@AS_2_F,AF_2_AS=@AF_2_AS,AF_2_F=@AF_2_F,AI_2_AS=@AI_2_AS ,AI_2_F=@AI_2_F,AA_3_A_6_AS=@AA_3_A_6_AS,AA_3_A_6_F=@AA_3_A_6_F,AS_3_A_6_AS=@AS_3_A_6_AS,AS_3_A_6_F=@AS_3_A_6_F,AF_3_A_6_AS=@AF_3_A_6_AS ,AF_3_A_6_F=@AF_3_A_6_F,AI_3_A_6_AS=@AI_3_A_6_AS,AI_3_A_6_F=@AI_3_A_6_F
where id_Corte=@IdCorte and Año=@Año and modalidad=@modalidad and grado=@Grado end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Rendimiento_Secundaria] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
--Rendimiento_Secundaria 1,'Secundaria diurna',2022
CREATE Proc [dbo].[Rendimiento_Secundaria] @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Año int as begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan ,dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel)as Grado,n.Nivel,m.modalidad,ct.Nombre as Corte, (select count(idMatricula) from matricula where estado='Activo' and grado=n.nivel and Año=@Año)as MI_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and m.grado=n.nivel and Año=@Año)as MI_F,
(select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as MA_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as MA_F,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año ) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) as Cantidad from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and a.sexo='F' and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and t.año=m.año inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 1 and 2 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@Año)as Aplasados_1a2_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and t.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 1 and 2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 3 and 8 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año)as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and t.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 3 and 8 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matem') and c.Estado='Activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_Matematica_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and c.Estado='activo'and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Matematica_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Español_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Español_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Ingles_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Ingles_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_TAC_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_TAC_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_CV_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_CV_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_EEFF_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_EEFF_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_EAEP_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and c.año=m.año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_EAEP_F,

-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 7º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=7 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_7_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and m.Estado='Activo' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=7 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_7_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=7 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_7_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=7 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_7_F,

(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=10 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AI_10_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 11º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and m.Estado='Activo' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_11_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_11_F,
-- de aqui
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AF_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AF_11_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AI_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AI_11_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 3º a 6º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_7_A_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and A.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AA_7_A_11_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_7_A_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=m.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AS_7_A_11_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.Año=@Año) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AF_7_A_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=M.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and Nt.Año=@Año) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AF_7_A_11_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and Nt.Año=@Año) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AI_7_A_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and t.Año=M.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and Nt.Año=@Año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as AI_7_A_11_F
from Notas N inner join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' inner join corte ct on n.IdCorte=ct.IdCorte where n.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and n.Año=@Año and m.Modalidad like @Modalidad+'%' group by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel),Nivel,m.Modalidad, ct.Nombre order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel) end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Rendimiento_Secundaria_2] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create Proc [dbo].[Rendimiento_Secundaria_2] @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Año int as begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan ,dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel)as Grado,n.Nivel,m.modalidad,ct.Nombre as Corte, (select count(idMatricula) from matricula where estado='Activo' and grado=n.nivel )as MI_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and m.grado=n.nivel )as MI_F,
(select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as MA_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as MA_F,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) as Cantidad from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and a.sexo='F' and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) as Aplasados_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 1 and 2 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)as Aplasados_1a2_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 1 and 2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 3 and 8 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 3 and 8 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matem') and c.Estado='Activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_Matematica_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and c.Estado='activo'and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Matematica_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Español_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Español_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Ingles_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Ingles_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_TAC_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_TAC_F,

(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EEFF_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EEFF_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EAEP_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EAEP_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCNN_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCNN_F,

(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Quimica') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_QUIMICA_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Quimica') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_QUIMICA_F,

(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('BIOLOGIA') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_BIOLOGIA_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('BIOLOGIA') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_BIOLOGIA_F,

-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 7º

(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_7_A_11_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 7 and 11 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_7_A_11_F,
-- Retención 7
((select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(Nivel)=7 and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)/ (select count(m.idMatricula) from matricula M where estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=7 ) )as Rt_7_As,
((select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=7 and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) / (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.grado)=7 ))as Rt_7_F,
-- Retención 8
((select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(Nivel)=8 and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)/ (select count(m.idMatricula) from matricula M where estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=8 ) )as Rt_8_As,
((select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=8 and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) / (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.grado)=8 ))as Rt_8_F,
-- Retención 9
((select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(Nivel)=9 and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)/ (select count(m.idMatricula) from matricula M where estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=9 ) )as Rt_9_As,
((select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=9 and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) / (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.grado)=9 ))as Rt_9_F,
-- Retención 10
((select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(Nivel)=10 and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)/ (select count(m.idMatricula) from matricula M where estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=10 ) )as Rt_10_As,
((select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=10 and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) / (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.grado)=10 ))as Rt_10_F,
-- Retención 11
((select COUNT(distinct IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(Nivel)=11 and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)/ (select count(m.idMatricula) from matricula M where estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.Grado)=11 ) )as Rt_11_As,
((select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=11 and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) / (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(m.grado)=11 ))as Rt_11_F
from Notas N inner join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' inner join corte ct on n.IdCorte=ct.IdCorte where n.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and n.Año=@Año and m.Modalidad like @Modalidad+'%' group by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel),Nivel,m.Modalidad, ct.Nombre order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel) end

and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EAEP], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as TAC, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], ISNULL((select (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio)), (select (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte= dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio))) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.estado='Activo' order by m.Grado, a.Apellidos ASC end else if @semestre='II' begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select Alumnos al on n.IdAlumno=al.IdAlumno where al.IdMined=a.IdMined and n.Anio=@Anio and n.Estado='Activo') as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('II Semestre')as Semestre, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as [Matemática], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], isnull((select (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio)),0) as INGLES, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EE FF], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EAEP], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as TAC, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO --Semestre_Secundaria_Cuantitativo 'décimo','I',2022 CREATE Proc [dbo].[Semestre_Secundaria_Cuantitativo]-- 'Septimo','I Semestre',2022 @Grado nchar(20), @Semestre as nvarchar(30), @Anio int as begin
--declare @Grado nchar(20),@Semestre as nvarchar(30),@Anio int --select @Grado ='Décimo',@Semestre ='I',@Anio=2022 if (@Semestre='I') begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, a.IdAlumno,ag.id_Docente as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('I Semestre')as Semestre, avg(nt.MATEMATICA) as MATEMATICA,avg(nt.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]) as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], avg(nt.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]) as [LENGUA EXTRANGERA], avg(nt.TAC) as TAC, avg(nt.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES],avg(nt.[EE FF]) as [EE FF], avg(nt.EAEP) as EAEP,avg(nt.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]) as [CIENCIAS NATURALES], avg(nt.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]) as [CIENCIAS SOCIALES], avg(nt.QUIMICA) as QUIMICA, avg(nt.FISICA) as FISICA,avg(nt.BIOLOGIA) as BIOLOGIA, avg(nt.GEOGRAFIA) as GEOGRAFIA, avg(nt.SOCIOLOGIA) as SOCIOLOGIA, avg(nt.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]) as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER],(0) as PROMEDIO --(select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as PROMEDIO
from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno inner join Registro_de_Notas Nt on nt.id_Alumno=A.IdAlumno and nt.Anio=m.Anio and nt.Id_Alumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Asignacin_De_Grado AG on ag.Anio=m.Anio and ag.Grado=m.Grado and ag.Modalidad=m.Modalidad and ag.Turno=m.Turno and ag.Seccion=m.Seccion
where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.estado='Activo' and nt.id_Corte between dbo.ID_CORTE('I Corte') and dbo.ID_CORTE('II Corte') group by ag.Id_Docente,a.IdAlumno,a.Nombres,a.Apellidos,a.IdMined,m.Modalidad,m.Grado order by m.Grado ,a.nombres asc
end else if (@Semestre='II') begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Anio from escuela E) as Eslogan, a.IdAlumno,ag.id_Docente as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('I Semestre')as Semestre, avg(nt.MATEMATICA) as MATEMATICA,avg(nt.[LENGUA Y LITERATURA]) as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], avg(nt.[LENGUA EXTRANGERA]) as [LENGUA EXTRANGERA], avg(nt.TAC) as TAC, avg(nt.[CRECIENDO EN VALORES]) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES],avg(nt.[EE FF]) as [EE FF], avg(nt.EAEP) as EAEP,avg(nt.[CIENCIAS NATURALES]) as [CIENCIAS NATURALES], avg(nt.[CIENCIAS SOCIALES]) as [CIENCIAS SOCIALES], avg(nt.QUIMICA) as QUIMICA, avg(nt.FISICA) as FISICA,avg(nt.BIOLOGIA) as BIOLOGIA, avg(nt.GEOGRAFIA) as GEOGRAFIA, avg(nt.SOCIOLOGIA) as SOCIOLOGIA, avg(nt.[DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER]) as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD DE LA MUJER],(0) as PROMEDIO --(select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as PROMEDIO
from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno inner join Registro_de_Notas Nt on nt.id_Alumno=A.IdAlumno and nt.Anio=m.Anio and nt.Id_Alumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Asignacin_De_Grado AG on ag.Anio=m.Anio and ag.Grado=m.Grado and ag.Modalidad=m.Modalidad and ag.Turno=m.Turno and ag.Seccion=m.Seccion
where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.estado='Activo' and nt.id_Corte between dbo.ID_CORTE('III Corte') and dbo.ID_CORTE('VI Corte') group by ag.Id_Docente,a.IdAlumno,a.Nombres,a.Apellidos,a.IdMined,m.Modalidad,m.Grado order by m.Grado ,a.nombres asc end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Semestre_Tercero_A_Sexto_Cuantitativo] if (@Semestre='I') begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan,a.IdAlumno,(select distinct(n.IdDocente) from Notas n inner join Alumnos al on n.IdAlumno=al.IdAlumno where al.IdMined=a.IdMined and n.Anio=@Anio and n.Estado='Activo') as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('I Semestre')as Semestre, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ) as [Matemática], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio)),'') as [LENGUA EXTRANGERA], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EE FF], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [EAEP], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CIENCIAS NA], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CIENCIAS S], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as TAC, (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES], (select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.Estado='activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC end else if (@Semestre='II') begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan,a.IdAlumno,(select distinct(n.IdDocente) from Notas n inner join Alumnos al on n.IdAlumno=al.IdAlumno where al.IdMined=a.IdMined and n.Anio=@Anio) as IdDocente, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('II Semestre')as Semestre, ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio ),'') as [Matemática], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [LENGUA Y LITERATURA], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [LENGUA EXTRANGERA], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [EE FF], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [EAEP], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [CIENCIAS NA], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [CIENCIAS S], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as TAC, ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES], ISNULL((select convert(int, ROUND(avg(convert(decimal, NOTA)),0)) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio),'') as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=@Anio) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Anio=@Anio and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.Estado='activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar] @Nombres as nvarchar(70) AS begin if (dbo.Grado_Numerico(@nombres)=0) begin select distinct (a.IdAlumno),a.IdMined,a.Nombres, a.Apellidos,a.Sexo,a.Nacimiento,DATEDIFF(year,a.Nacimiento,getdate()) as Edad from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where a.Nombres+' '+a.apellidos + a.IdMined + m.Modalidad + ltrim(RTRIM(m.Grado))+' '+ltrim(RTRIM(m.seccion))+' '+convert(nvarchar,m.Anio) like '%'+@nombres+'%' and a.Estado='Activo' and m.estado!='Eliminado' group by a.IdAlumno,a.IdMined,a.Nombres, a.Apellidos,a.Sexo,a.Nacimiento,m.Modalidad end else begin select distinct (a.IdAlumno),a.IdMined,a.Nombres, a.Apellidos,a.Sexo,a.Nacimiento,DATEDIFF(year,a.Nacimiento,getdate()) as Edad from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Grado_Numerico(ltrim(RTRIM(m.Grado))) = dbo.Grado_Numerico(@nombres) and a.Estado='Activo' and m.estado!='Eliminado' group by a.IdAlumno,a.IdMined,a.Nombres, a.Apellidos,a.Sexo,a.Nacimiento,m.Modalidad end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar_Apellidos] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar_Apellidos] @Nombres as nvarchar(70), @Apellidos as nvarchar(70)
AS begin select a.IdAlumno,a.IdMined,a.Nombres, a.Apellidos,a.Sexo,a.Nacimiento,DATEDIFF(year,a.Nacimiento,getdate()) as Edad from Alumnos a where a.Nombres like @Nombres + '%' and a.Apellidos like @Apellidos +'%' and a.Estado='Activo'
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar_Matricula] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Buscar_Matricula] @Id_Alumno as Int AS begin select m.IdMatricula,a.IdAlumno,a.IdMined,m.Modalidad,m.Grado,Turno,Seccion,m.Anio,m.Estado from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where a.IdAlumno=@Id_Alumno and a.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado!='Eliminado'
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Editar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Editar] @IdAlumno int, @Nombres nvarchar(70), @Apellidos nvarchar(70), @IdMined nvarchar(50), @Sexo nchar(10), @Nacimiento date AS begin update Alumnos set IdMined=@IdMined, Nombres=@Nombres, Apellidos=@Apellidos, Sexo=@Sexo, Nacimiento=@Nacimiento
where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Eliminar] @IdAlumno int AS begin update Alumnos set Estado = 'Eliminado'
where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROC [dbo].[Sp_Alumnos_Insertar] @Id_Alumno int output, @Nombres nvarchar(70), @Apellidos nvarchar(70), @IdMined nvarchar(50), @Sexo nchar(10), @Nacimiento date AS begin if exists(select Nombres from Alumnos where IdMined=@IdMined) raiserror('Ya existe un alumno registrado con esos datos',16,1) else begin insert into Alumnos (IdMined,Nombres,Apellidos,Sexo,Nacimiento,Estado) values( @IdMined,@Nombres,@Apellidos,@Sexo,@Nacimiento,'Activo')
set @Id_Alumno = @@identity end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Buscar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO --Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Buscar 11
CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Buscar] @Id_Docente int as begin select a.Id_asignacion,a.Id_Docente,(d.nombres+' ' + d.apellidos) as Docente,a.Modalidad, a.grado as Grado,a.Turno,a.Seccion,a.anio as [Anio Lectivo], a.Estado from Docentes D inner join Asignacin_De_Grado as A on d.IdDocente=a.Id_Docente where a.Id_Docente=@Id_Docente and a.Estado='Activo' end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Editar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Editar] @Id_Asignacion int, @Id_Docente int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Grado nchar(15), @Anio int, @Turno nvarchar(30), @Seccion nvarchar(2) as begin declare @asignacion int declare @Docente int
select @asignacion=isnull(id_asignacion,0),@Docente=isnull(Id_Docente,0) from Asignacin_De_Grado where Grado=@Grado and Anio=@Anio and Modalidad=@Modalidad and Turno=@Turno and Seccion=@Seccion if (@asignacion=0) begin update Asignacin_De_Grado set Id_Docente=@Id_Docente,Grado=@Grado,Anio=@Anio,Modalidad=@Modalidad,Turno=@Turno,Seccion=@Seccion where id_asignacion=@Id_Asignacion and Estado='Activo' end else begin raiserror('Ya hay un docente con ese grado asignado',16,1) end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Eliminar] @Id_Asignacion int as begin update Asignacin_De_Grado set Estado='Eliminado' where id_asignacion=@Id_Asignacion and Estado='Activo' end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignacion_Grado_Insertar] @Id_Docente int, @Grado nchar(15), @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Anio int, @Turno as nvarchar(30), @Seccion nchar(5) as begin declare @asignacion int declare @Docente int
--select @asignacion=isnull(id_asignacion,0),@Docente=isnull(Id_Docente,0) from Asignacin_De_Grado where Grado=@Grado and Año=@Año and -- Modalidad=@Modalidad and Turno=@Turno and Seccion=@Seccion and estado='Activo' if not exists (select id_asignacion from Asignacin_De_Grado where Grado=@Grado and Anio=@Anio and Modalidad=@Modalidad and Turno=@Turno and Seccion=@Seccion and Estado='Activo') begin insert into Asignacin_De_Grado(Id_Docente,Grado,Anio,Modalidad,Turno,Seccion) values(@Id_Docente,@Grado,@Anio,@Modalidad,@Turno,@Seccion) end else begin declare @mensaje nvarchar(Max) set @mensaje ='Ya hay un docente con ese grado asignado '+convert(nvarchar,@Anio)--+' asignacion: '+convert(nvarchar,@asignacion) raiserror(@mensaje,16,1) end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Eliminar] @idasignacion int as begin update Docentes_Asignaciones set Estado='Eliminado' where IdAsignacion=@idasignacion end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Insertar] @IdDocente int, @IdAsignatura int, @Modalidad nvarchar(100), @Grado Varchar(30), @Turno varchar(20), @Seccion Varchar(5), @anio int as begin if not exists (select IdAsignatura from docentes_asignaciones D where IdAsignatura=@IdAsignatura and Modalidad=@modalidad and Grado=@grado and Turno=@Turno and Seccion=@Seccion and Anio=@Anio) begin insert into Docentes_Asignaciones(IdDocente,IdAsignatura,Modalidad,Grado,Turno,Seccion,Anio) values(@IdDocente,@IdAsignatura,@Modalidad,@Grado,@Turno,@Seccion,@anio) end else begin raiserror('Esta Asignatura ya ha sido asignada',16,1) end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Mostrar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaciones_Mostrar] @IdDocente int, @Anio int as begin select da.IdAsignacion,da.IdDocente,da.IdAsignatura,a.Nombre as [Asignatura/Disciplina], da.Modalidad,da.Grado as [Grado/Nivel],da.Seccion,da.Turno,da.Anio from Docentes_Asignaciones DA INNER JOIN Asignaturas A on DA.IdAsignatura=A.IdAsignatura INNER JOIN Docentes D on DA.IdDocente=d.IdDocente
where da.Estado='Activo' and da.IdDocente=@IdDocente and da.Anio=@Anio order by da.Modalidad asc, dbo.grado_numerico(da.grado) asc end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Eliminar] @IdAsignatura int as begin update Asignaturas set Estado ='Eliminado' where IdAsignatura=@IdAsignatura end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Insertar] @Nombre as nvarchar(50) as begin IF not exists (select nombre from Asignaturas where Nombre=@Nombre and estado='Activo') begin insert into Asignaturas(Nombre) values (@Nombre) end else begin raiserror('La Asignatura ya existe.',16,1) end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Mostrar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Asignaturas_Mostrar] as begin Select * from Asignaturas where Estado='Activo' order by Nombre asc end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Eliminar] @id_Asignacion int as begin update asignaturasporgrado set estado='Eliminado' where id_Asignacion=@id_Asignacion end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Insertar] @id_Asignatura int, @Grado nchar(20), @Modalidad nvarchar(50) as if not exists (select modalidad from AsignaturasPorGrado where grado=@Grado and id_Asignatura=@id_Asignatura and Modalidad=@Modalidad and Estado='Activo') begin insert into AsignaturasPorGrado(Id_Asignatura,Grado,Modalidad) values(@id_Asignatura,@Grado,@Modalidad) end else raiserror('La Asignaura ya Fue asignada al Grado y modalidad,',16,1)
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Mostrar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_AsignaturasPorGrado_Mostrar] @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Grado nvarchar(20) as select ad.id_Asignacion,a.IdAsignatura, ltrim(rtrim(ad.Modalidad)) as Modalidad, ad.grado,a.nombre as Asignatura from Asignaturas A inner join asignaturasporgrado AD on a.IdAsignatura=ad.id_Asignatura where a.Estado='Activo' and ad.estado='Activo' and ltrim(rtrim(ad.Modalidad))like @Modalidad +'%' and ltrim(rtrim(ad.Grado))like @Grado+'%' order by ad.modalidad desc GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Cortes_Mostrar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Cortes_Mostrar] as begin select * from Corte end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Docentes_Buscar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Docentes_Buscar] @Avanzada int, @TextoBuscar as nvarchar(50) as begin if (@Avanzada=1) begin Select distinct(d.IdDocente),d.Nombres,d.Apellidos,d.Cedula,d.Sexo,d.[User] as Usuario,d.Pass as Contraseña,d.Acceso as Rol, d.Telefono from Docentes D inner join Asignacin_De_Grado A on a.Id_Docente=d.IdDocente and a.estado='Activo' where d.Estado='Activo' and d.Nombres+d.Apellidos+d.[User]+d.Acceso+d.Cedula+a.grado+a.turno+a.modalidad like '%'+ @TextoBuscar + '%' end else if (@Avanzada=0) begin Select distinct(d.IdDocente),d.Nombres,d.Apellidos,d.Cedula,d.Sexo,d.[User] as Usuario,d.Pass as Contraseña,d.Acceso as Rol, d.Telefono from Docentes D where d.Estado='Activo' and d.Nombres+d.Apellidos+d.[User]+d.Acceso+d.Cedula like '%'+ @TextoBuscar + '%' end end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Docentes_Buscar_Apellidos] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Docentes_Buscar_Apellidos] @TextoBuscar as nvarchar(50), @Apellidos nvarchar(50) as begin Select d.IdDocente,d.Nombres,d.Apellidos,d.Cedula,d.Sexo,d.[User] as Usuario,d.Pass as Contraseña,d.Acceso as Rol, d.Telefono
from Docentes D
where d.Estado='Activo' and d.Nombres Like'%' + @TextoBuscar + '%' and d.Apellidos lIKE '%' + @Apellidos + '%' end

where IdDocente=@IdDocente
end

end

GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Editar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Editar] @Id_Matricula int, @Id_Alumno as int, @Grado nchar(15), @Turno nvarchar(20), @Seccion nchar(2), @Modalidad as nvarchar(50) AS begin update Matricula set Grado=@Grado,Modalidad=@Modalidad,Turno=@Turno,Seccion=@Seccion where IdAlumno=@Id_Alumno and IdMatricula=@Id_Matricula end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Eliminar] @id_matricula int as begin update Matricula set estado='Eliminado' where IdMatricula=@id_matricula end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Insertar] @Id_Alumno as int, @Grado as nvarchar(20), @Modalidad as nvarchar(50), @Fecha as date, @Turno nvarchar(20), @Seccion nchar(2), @Anio as int AS begin if exists(select idalumno from Matricula where IdAlumno=@Id_Alumno and anio=@Anio AND Estado='Activo') raiserror('El alumno ya esta matriculado',16,1) else if exists(select idalumno from Alumnos where IdAlumno=@Id_Alumno and Estado='Activo') raiserror('El alumno no existe',16,1) else begin insert into Matricula(IdAlumno,Grado,Modalidad,Fecha,Anio,Turno,Seccion) values(@Id_Alumno,@Grado,@Modalidad,@Fecha,@Anio,@Turno,@Seccion) end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Insertar_Id_Mined] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Insertar_Id_Mined] @Id_Alumno as nvarchar(50), @Grado nchar(15), @Modalidad as nvarchar(50), @Fecha as date, @Anio as int, @Turno nvarchar(20), @Seccion nchar(2), @Respuesta nvarchar(max) output AS begin declare @Id int declare @Rpta int declare @Mensaje nvarchar(max) declare @grado_Anterior int set @Id = dbo.Verificar_Si_Existe_Alumno(@Id_Alumno)
if @id>0 begin set @rpta=dbo.Verificar_Si_Esta_Matriculado(@Id_Alumno,@Anio) if @Rpta=0 begin -- debo validar qeue el año sea diferente
set @grado_Anterior=isnull((select max(dbo.Grado_Numerico(grado))from Matricula M where (select IdAlumno from Alumnos where IdMined=@Id_Alumno and estado='Activo')=IdAlumno and M.Estado='Activo'),0)
if @grado_Anterior<=dbo.Grado_Numerico(@Grado) begin insert into Matricula(IdAlumno,Grado,Modalidad,Fecha,Anio,Turno,Seccion) values(@Id,@Grado,@Modalidad,@Fecha,@Anio,@Turno,@Seccion) set @Respuesta = 'Ok' end else begin print 'no puede matricular al alumno en un grado menor al anterior' set @Respuesta = 'no puede matricular al alumno en un grado menor al anterior '--+CONVERT(char,@grado_anterior) end end else begin print 'El alumno ya esta matriculado' set @Respuesta = 'El alumno ya esta matriculado' end end else begin print 'El alumno no existe en la base de datos' set @Respuesta = 'El alumno no existe en la base de datos' end
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Restaurar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Restaurar] @id_matricula int as begin update Matricula set estado='Activo' where IdMatricula=@id_matricula end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Suspender] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create proc [dbo].[Sp_Matricula_Suspender] @id_matricula int as begin update Matricula set estado='Suspendido' where IdMatricula=@id_matricula end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Mostrar_Boletin] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Mostrar_Boletin] @IdAlumno int, @Anio int as begin
select distinct(a.Nombre) as Asignatura,a.IdAsignatura,m.Grado,m.Modalidad, (Select (Nombres+' '+Apellidos) from Alumnos where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno)as Alumno, (Select IdMined from Alumnos where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno)as IdMined, isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select nota from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte=dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('I Corte') and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-') as [I Corte], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select nota from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte=dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('II Corte')and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [II Corte], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select avg(nota) from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte between dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('I Corte') and dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('II Corte') and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [I Semestre], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select nota from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte=dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('III Corte')and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [III Corte], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select nota from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte=dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('IV Corte')and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [IV Corte], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select avg(nota) from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte between dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('III Corte') and dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('IV Corte') and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [II Semestre], isnull(convert(nvarchar,(select avg(nota) from notas t where t.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte between dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('I Corte') and dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('IV Corte') and t.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and t.Anio=n.Anio and t.Estado='Activo')),'-')as [Final] from Notas N right outer Join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and m.Anio=@Anio full outer join Asignaturas A on a.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and a.Estado='Activo'
where m.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.Anio=@Anio order by a.IdAsignatura asc end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Mostrar_Notas] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Mostrar_Notas] @IdAlumno int, @idCorte int, @Anio int as begin
select n.IdNota, a.IdAsignatura,a.Nombre as Asignatura,n.Nota from Notas N right outer Join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and n.Anio=m.Anio full outer join Asignaturas A on a.IdAsignatura=n.IdAsignatura and a.Estado='Activo'
where m.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdCorte=@idCorte and n.anio=@anio
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_All] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_All]
@Año int as select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, --A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ) as [MATEÁTICA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as ESPAÑOL, (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as INGLES, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))) as TAC, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [CRECIENDO EN VALORES], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [EEFF], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [AEP], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [CCNN], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SICIALES') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [CCSS], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('QUIMICA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [QUIMICA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('FISICA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [FÍSICA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('BIOLOGIA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [BIOLOGIA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('GEOGRAFIA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [GEOGRAFIA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('SOCIOLOGIA') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as [SOCIOLOGIA], (Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_Primaria] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_Primaria] @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Corte as INT, @Año int as select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, (select Nombre from Corte where IdCorte=@Corte)as Corte, isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ),'') as [MATEÁTICA], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [LENGUA_Y_LITERATURA], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as INGLES, isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [EEFF], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [AEP], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES ') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCNN], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCSS], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))),'') as TAC, isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [CONOCIENDO_MI_MUNDO], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [DERECHO_DIGNIDAD], isnull((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [PROMEDIO] from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año and m.Modalidad=@Modalidad order by m.Grado, a.Apellidos ASC GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_Primero_Segundo] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc --Sp_MostrarNota_Tercero_A_Sexto 'Cuarto',1,2022 CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_MostrarNota_Tercero_A_Sexto] @Grado nchar(20), @Corte as INT, @Año int as
select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ),'') as [MATEÁTICA], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [LENGUA_Y_LITERATURA], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as INGLES, --isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [EEFF], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [EEFF], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [AEP], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCNN], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCSS], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [DERECHO_DIGNIDAD], isnull((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M
