dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCNN], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SOCIALES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CCSS], --isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))),'') as TAC, --isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], --isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),'') as [DERECHO_DIGNIDAD], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ),'') as TAC, isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], isnull((Select N.nota from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as [DERECHO_DIGNIDAD],
isnull((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte=@Corte and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad= @Modalidad--'PRIMARIA REGULAR' AND M.ESTADO='Activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_CargarAsignaturas] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_CargarAsignaturas] @IdAlumno int, @IdCorte int, @Modaliad nvarchar(50), --@Turno nvarchar(30), @Grado nchar(20), @Anio int as select distinct(a.IdAsignatura) as IdAsignatura,a.Nombre as Asignatura from Asignaturas A inner join AsignaturasPorGrado AG on a.IdAsignatura=AG.id_Asignatura where not exists (select nota from notas where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdCorte=@IdCorte and a.idasignatura=IdAsignatura and estado='Activo' and Anio=@Anio) --AND AG.Modalidad=@Modaliad and ag.Grado=@Grado and ag.estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Eliminar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Eliminar] @id_nota int as --update Notas set estado='Elimindo' delete Notas where IdNota=@id_nota
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar] @IdCorte int, @IdAsignatura int, @IdAlumno int, @IdDocente int, @Nivel nchar(20), @Anio int, @Nota int as begin if not exists (select n.idalumno from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and n.Nivel=@Nivel and n.Anio=@Anio and n.IdCorte=@IdCorte and estado='Activo') begin insert into Notas(IdCorte,IdAsignatura,IdAlumno,IdDocente,Nivel,Anio,Fecha,Nota) values(@IdCorte,@IdAsignatura,@IdAlumno,@IdDocente,@Nivel,@Anio,getdate(),@Nota) end else begin raiserror('La nota de esta asignatura ya ha sido insertada.!',16,1) end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar_Lote] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar_Lote] @IdCorte int, @Asignatura nvarchar(40), @IdAlumno int, @IdDocente int, @Nivel nchar(20), @Anio int, @Nota int as declare @idAsignatura as int set @IdAsignatura=isnull(dbo.GetIDAsignatura(@Asignatura),0) begin if not exists (select n.idalumno from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and n.Nivel=@Nivel and n.Anio=@Anio and n.IdCorte=@IdCorte and estado='Activo') begin if @IdAsignatura>0 begin insert into Notas(IdCorte,IdAsignatura,IdAlumno,IdDocente,Nivel,Anio,Fecha,Nota) values(@IdCorte,@IdAsignatura,@IdAlumno,@IdDocente,@Nivel,@Anio,getdate(),@Nota) end else begin raiserror('No se Obtuvo el Id de la asignatura!',16,1) end end else begin UPDATE Notas SET Nota=@Nota where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and Nivel=@Nivel and Anio=@Anio and IdCorte=@IdCorte and estado='Activo' end end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar_Por_Lote] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
-- script creado para subir la notas de los centros que lo requieran y lo maneje en digital
CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Insertar_Por_Lote] @Corte nvarchar(20), @Asignatura nvarchar(40), @CodigoAlumno nvarchar(80), @IdDocente int, @Nivel nchar(20), @Anio int, @Nota int as declare @idAsignatura as int declare @IdCorte as int declare @IdAlumno as int
set @IdAlumno=(select idalumno from Alumnos where IdMined=@CodigoAlumno) set @IdCorte=(select dbo.GET_ID_CORTE(@Corte)) set @IdAsignatura=isnull(dbo.GetIDAsignatura(@Asignatura),0)
begin if not exists (select n.idalumno from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and n.Nivel=@Nivel and n.Anio=@Anio and n.IdCorte=@IdCorte and estado='Activo') begin if @IdAsignatura>0 begin insert into Notas(IdCorte,IdAsignatura,IdAlumno,IdDocente,Nivel,Anio,Fecha,Nota) values(@IdCorte,@IdAsignatura,@IdAlumno,@IdDocente,@Nivel,@Anio,getdate(),@Nota) end else begin raiserror('No se Obtuvo el Id de la asignatura!',16,1) end end else begin UPDATE Notas SET Nota=@Nota where IdAlumno=@IdAlumno and IdAsignatura=@Idasignatura and Nivel=@Nivel and Anio=@Anio and IdCorte=@IdCorte and estado='Activo' end end --select dbo.GET_ID_CORTE('III Corte') GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Mostrar_ParaIngrsar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Mostrar_ParaIngrsar] @Alumno nvarchar(50), @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Grado Nchar(20), @Anio int, @idCorte int, @Turno nvarchar(20), --- campos agregados --> @Seccion nchar(5) as begin select A.IdAlumno,AGD.Id_Docente,
(a.Nombres +' ' + a.Apellidos) as Estudiante, a.IdMined as [Codigo Estudiante], (d.Nombres+' '+d.Apellidos) as Docente,m.Grado,m.Modalidad,m.Anio
from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and a.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Asignacin_De_Grado AGD on agd.Modalidad=m.Modalidad and agd.Grado=m.Grado and agd.Anio=m.Anio and AGD.Turno=m.Turno and agd.Seccion=m.Seccion and agd.Estado='Activo'
inner join Docentes D on agd.Id_Docente=d.IdDocente and d.Estado='Activo'
where M.Modalidad = @Modalidad AND M.Grado = @Grado and M.Anio= @Anio and m.Turno=@Turno and m.Seccion=@Seccion
and a.nombres +' '+ a.apellidos + a.IdMined+(d.Nombres+' '+d.Apellidos) like '%' + @Alumno + '%'
end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Restaurar] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Restaurar] @id_Alumno int, @Anio int as update Notas set estado='Activo' where IdAlumno=@id_Alumno and Anio=@anio and estado='Suspendido' GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Suspender] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Sp_Notas_Suspender] @id_Alumno int, @Anio int as update Notas set estado='Suspendido' where IdAlumno=@id_Alumno and Anio=@anio and estado='Activo' GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO
--Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria 1,'primaria regular',2022
--select count(m.grado),m.grado,m.modalidad,m.año from matricula m where m.año=2022 --group by m.grado,m.modalidad,m.año
CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria] @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Año int as begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel)as Grado,n.Nivel,m.modalidad,ct.Nombre as Corte, (select count(idMatricula) from matricula where estado='Activo' and grado=n.nivel and m.Año=@Año and Modalidad=@Modalidad)as MI_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and m.grado=n.nivel and m.Año=@Año and m.Modalidad=@Modalidad and m.estado='Activo')as MI_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as MA_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@Año) as MA_F,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@Año) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) as Cantidad from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and a.sexo='F' and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@Año) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@Año) as Aplasados_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 1 and 2 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@Año)as Aplasados_1a2_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 1 and 2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@Año) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 3 and 8 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año)as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 3 and 8 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.Año=@Año) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matem') and c.Estado='Activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Matematica_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matematica') and c.Estado='activo'and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_Matematica_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@Año) as Apr_L_Español_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_Español_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_Ingles_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_Ingles_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_TAC_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_TAC_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_CV_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_CV_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año) as Apr_L_EEFF_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.Año=@Año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_EEFF_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_EAEP_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_EAEP_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_CCNN_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_CCNN_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS S') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_CCSS_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS S') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_CCSS_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CONOCIEN') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CONOCIEN') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('DERECHO') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año) as Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno and m.Año=c.Año inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('DERECHO') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and c.año=@año and m.Estado='Activo') as Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 1º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and m.Estado='Activo' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_1_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 2º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and m.Estado='Activo' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_2_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_2_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_2_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_2_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 3º a 6º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and A.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AA_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AS_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AF_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno and m.Año=t.Año INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and nt.año=@año) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and t.año=@año) as AI_3_A_6_F
from Notas N inner join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' inner join corte ct on n.IdCorte=ct.IdCorte where n.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and n.Año=@Año AND M.Año=@Año AND M.Estado='Activo' and m.Modalidad like @Modalidad+'%' group by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel),Nivel,m.Modalidad, ct.Nombre,m.Año,n.Año order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel) end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria_1] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create Proc [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria_1] @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Año int as begin SELECT (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan,Grado,Nivel,modalidad,Corte,MI_AS,MI_F,MA_AS,MA_F,Aprovados_Limpios_AS ,Aprovados_Limpios_F,Aplasados_AS,Aplasados_F,Aplasados_1a2_AS,Aplasados_1a2_F,Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,Aplasados_3_a_mas_F ,Apr_L_Matematica_AS,Apr_L_Matematica_F,Apr_L_Español_AS,Apr_L_Español_F,Apr_L_Ingles_AS,Apr_L_Ingles_F,Apr_L_TAC_AS,Apr_L_TAC_F ,Apr_L_CV_AS,Apr_L_CV_F,Apr_L_EEFF_AS,Apr_L_EEFF_F,Apr_L_EAEP_AS,Apr_L_EAEP_F,Apr_L_CCNN_AS,Apr_L_CCNN_F,Apr_L_CCSS_AS ,Apr_L_CCSS_F,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS,Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS,Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F ,AA_1_AS,AA_1_F,AS_1_AS,AS_1_F,AF_1_AS,AF_1_F,AI_1_AS,AI_1_F,AA_2_AS,AA_2_F,AS_2_AS,AS_2_F,AF_2_AS,AF_2_F,AI_2_AS,AI_2_F,AA_3_A_6_AS ,AA_3_A_6_F,AS_3_A_6_AS,AS_3_A_6_F,AF_3_A_6_AS,AF_3_A_6_F,AI_3_A_6_AS,AI_3_A_6_F FROM Rendimiento_Academico_Primaria where id_Corte=@id_Corte and modalidad=@Modalidad and Año=@Año end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria_trabajo] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO create Proc [dbo].[Sp_Rendimiento_Primaria_trabajo] @Id_Corte int, @Modalidad nvarchar(50), @Año int as begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel)as Grado,n.Nivel,m.modalidad,ct.Nombre as Corte, (select count(idMatricula) from matricula where estado='Activo' and grado=n.nivel )as MI_AS, (select count(a.sexo) from Alumnos a inner join Matricula M on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where sexo='F' and m.grado=n.nivel )as MI_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as MA_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and t.Estado='Activo' --Reajustes aqui where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año) between 0 and 8 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as MA_F,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) from Notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and m.Estado='Activo' and a.Estado='Activo' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) as Aprovados_Limpios_AS,
(select count(distinct t.idAlumno) as Cantidad from Notas t inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and t.Estado='Activo' where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)=0 and a.sexo='F' and t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aprovados_Limpios_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) as Aplasados_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.IdAlumno) from notas t inner join matricula M on t.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos a on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)>0 and t.Nivel=n.Nivel and t.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 1 and 2 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)as Aplasados_1a2_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 1 and 2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_1a2_F,
(select count(distinct c.IdAlumno) from Notas C where c.nivel=n.nivel and c.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(c.idalumno,c.idcorte,c.nivel,c.año)between 3 and 8 and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte)as Aplasados_3_a_mas_AS,
(select count(distinct t.IdAlumno) from Notas t inner join Matricula m on m.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and m.Estado='Activo' inner join Alumnos A on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where t.nivel=n.nivel and t.Estado='Activo'and a.Sexo='F' and dbo.Total_Asignaturas_Reprovadas(t.idalumno,t.idcorte,t.nivel,t.año)between 3 and 8 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Aplasados_3_a_mas_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matem') and c.Estado='Activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Matematica_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and c.Estado='activo'and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Matematica_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Español_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITER') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Español_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Ingles_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANG') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_Ingles_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_TAC_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('TAC') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_TAC_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CV_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('Creciendo') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CV_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EEFF_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('ee ff') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EEFF_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EAEP_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_EAEP_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCNN_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS N') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCNN_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS S') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCSS_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS S') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CCSS_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CONOCIEN') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('CONOCIEN') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_CONOCIENDO_MI_M_F,
(select count(c.idalumno) from notas c where c.nota>59 and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('DERECHO') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_AS, (select count(c.idalumno) from notas c inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=c.IdAlumno inner join Alumnos A on a.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno where c.nota>59 and a.Sexo='F' and c.Nivel=n.Nivel and c.IdAsignatura=dbo.Id_A('DERECHO') and c.Estado='activo' and c.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as Apr_L_DERECHO_DIGNIDAD_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 1º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='Activo' and m.Estado='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AS_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AS_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AF_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AF_1_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_1_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=1 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_1_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 2º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='Activo' and m.Estado='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_2_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AS_2_AS,

(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AF_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AF_2_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_2_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)=2 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_2_F,
-- Seleccionando los niveles de aprendisaje por as y f de 3º a 6º
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and A.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 90 and 100 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AA_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 76 and 89 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AS_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 76 and 89 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AS_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) between 60 and 75 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte ) as AF_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 60 and 75 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AF_3_A_6_F,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_3_A_6_AS,
(select COUNT(distinct t.idalumno) from notas t INNER JOIN Matricula M ON M.IdAlumno=T.IdAlumno INNER JOIN Alumnos A ON A.IdAlumno=M.IdAlumno where t.Nivel=n.nivel and t.estado='Activo' and M.Estado='Activo' and a.Sexo='F' and (select avg(NT.nota) from Notas NT WHERE NT.IdAlumno=t.IdAlumno and nt.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) between 0 and 59 and dbo.Grado_Numerico(t.Nivel)between 3 and 6 and t.IdCorte=@Id_Corte) as AI_3_A_6_F
from Notas N inner join Matricula M on n.IdAlumno=m.IdAlumno and n.Estado='Activo' inner join corte ct on n.IdCorte=ct.IdCorte where n.IdCorte=@Id_Corte and n.Año=@Año and m.Modalidad like @Modalidad+'%' group by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel),Nivel,m.Modalidad, ct.Nombre order by dbo.Grado_Numerico(n.Nivel) end GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Sp_Semestre_Primero_Segundo] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE Proc [dbo].[Sp_Semestre_Primero_Segundo] @Grado nchar(20), @Año int, @semestre nchar(2) as if @semestre='I' begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('I Semestre')as Semestre, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))) as [MATEÁTICA], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [LENGUA_Y_LITERATURA], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as INGLES, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EE FF') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [EEFF], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [AEP], isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))), isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.IdCorte = dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))), isnull((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CONOCIENDO MI MUNDO') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))),''))) as [CONOCIENDO_MI_MUNDO], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))) as TAC, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [DERECHO_DIGNIDAD], ISNULL((select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('I Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))), (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte= dbo.get_id_corte('II Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)))) as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.estado='Activo' order by m.Grado, a.Apellidos ASC end else if @semestre='II' begin select (select E.Codigo_Unico from escuela E) as Codigo_Escuela, (select E.Nombre from escuela E) as Escuela, (select E.Logo from escuela E) as Logo, (select E.Eslogan_Del_Año from escuela E) as Eslogan, (A.Nombres +' '+ A.Apellidos) as Alumno,A.idmined,M.Modalidad,M.Grado, ('II Semestre')as Semestre, (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('Matemática') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ))) as [MATEÁTICA], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA Y LITERATURA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año))) as [LENGUA_Y_LITERATURA], (select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('LENGUA EXTRANGERA') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and dbo.Id_A('EAEP') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)))),'') as [AEP], ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS NATURALES ') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)),'') as [CCNN], ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CIENCIAS SICIALES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)),'') as [CCSS], ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año )))),'') as TAC, --ISNULL((Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('TAC') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año ),'') as TAC, ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('CRECIENDO EN VALORES') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)))),'') as [CRECIENDO_EN_VALORES], ISNULL(CONVERT(NVARCHAR,(select dbo.Nota_Cualitativo((Select AVG(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdAsignatura= dbo.Id_A('DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD') and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año)))),'') as [DERECHO Y DIGNIDAD], ISNULL((Select avg(N.nota) from Notas N where n.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno and n.IdCorte between dbo.get_id_corte('III Corte') and dbo.get_id_corte('IV Corte') and n.Estado='Activo' and n.Año=@Año),'') as PROMEDIO from Alumnos A inner join Matricula M on m.IdAlumno=a.IdAlumno where m.Año=@Año and m.Grado=@Grado and m.Modalidad='PRIMARIA REGULAR' and m.Estado='activo' order by m.Grado,a.Apellidos ASC end
GO /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[Validar_si_existe_M_Inicial] Script Date: 25/10/2022 15:44:48 ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE proc [dbo].[Validar_si_existe_M_Inicial] --2022,'primria multigrado' @Anio int, @Modalidad nvarchar(60) as begin declare @mi int declare @ma int DECLARE @Retencion decimal(5,2)
set @mi=(select sum([as]) from M_Inicial where Modalidad = @Modalidad and Anio=@Anio ) set @ma=(select count(distinct(IdAlumno)) from Matricula where Modalidad =@Modalidad and Anio=@Anio and Estado='Activo')
set @Retencion=convert(decimal(5,2),@ma)/convert(decimal(5,2),@mi) print @ma print @mi print @Retencion if (@Retencion>.4) begin select '1' end else begin select '0' end end
--Validar_si_existe_M_Inicial 2022,'SECUNDARIA REGULAR' GO USE [master] GO ALTER DATABASE [Francisca_Hernandez_E] SET READ_WRITE GO
